data.title: BBC Programme Index
data.text:
06:00

Breakfast

01/08/2016

Duration: 3 hours, 15 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 06:00 on BBC One London

The latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team.

09:15

Countryfile Summer Diaries

2016

Episode 1: On the Coast

Duration: 45 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 09:15 on BBC One London

John Craven and the team explore summer in the British countryside. Margherita Taylor reports on a summer crop that is being grown for pain relief. Show more

10:00

Homes Under the Hammer

Series 18

Episode 53

Duration: 1 hour

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 10:00 on BBC One London

Property renovation series. In Folkestone, Kent, Lucy finds a big renovation project looking for just the right purchaser. Martin looks around a disused post office. Show more

11:00

Wanted Down Under

Series 10

Episode 17: Lawrence Family

Duration: 44 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 11:00 on BBC One London

Families explore the possibility of moving to Australia or New Zealand. Jon is hoping a trial week in Wellington will convince his wife to emigrate. Show more

11:45

Neighbourhood Blues

30-Minute Reversions

Episode 16

Duration: 29 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 11:45 on BBC One London

Documentary series following Humberside's neighbourhood police. A PCSO gets in the thick of the action as he tackles a lad wanted for assault. Show more

12:15

Bargain Hunt

Series 44

Episode 22: Edinburgh 21

Duration: 44 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 12:15 on BBC One London

Thomas Plant presents from the Royal Highland Centre just outside Edinburgh, with experts Kate Bliss and Ben Cooper. Two teams of married couples compete. Show more

13:00

BBC News at One

01/08/2016

Duration: 30 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 13:00 on BBC One London

The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

13:45

Red Rock

Series 1

Episode 16

Duration: 42 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 13:45 on BBC One London

Soap based around a Dublin Garda station. Connor gets more involved in drugs. Sean solves the mystery of a car with blood inside. Rebellious Rachel's behaviour worries Brian. Show more

14:25

Escape to the Country

Series 16 (60 minute versions)

Episode 6: West Sussex

Duration: 58 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 14:25 on BBC One London

Property series. Sonali Shah is property-searching in West Sussex with a couple who want their Â£625,000 to buy them uninterrupted peace in the country. Show more

15:25

Garden Rescue

Series 1

Episode 16: Stamford

Duration: 44 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 15:25 on BBC One London

Garden renovation series with Charlie Dimmock and garden designers the Rich brothers. A suburban garden is transformed into a rural idyll for parents of five to escape to. Show more

16:10

Flog It!

Series 13 (60-Minute Versions)

Episode 16: Leicester 17

Duration: 1 hour

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 16:10 on BBC One London

Available for 3 months

Antiques series. Paul Martin presents from De Monfort Hall in Leicester. Experts Catherine Southon and Claire Rawle hunt for antiques and collectibles to take to auction. Show more

17:10

Pointless Celebrities

Series 6

Episode 16: Kids' TV

Duration: 49 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 17:10 on BBC One London

Alexander Armstrong presents a kids' TV edition of the quiz that rewards answers that no-one else could think of, with guests including Dave Benson-Phillips and Pat Sharp. Show more

20:30

Panorama

Inside North Korea

Duration: 29 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 20:30 on BBC One London

BBC reporter Rupert Wingfield-Hayes discusses his time in North Korea and explores what his detention and interrogation by senior Korean officials say about this secretive state. Show more

21:00

The Musketeers

Series 3

Episode 10: We Are the Garrison

Duration: 55 minutes

Mon 1st Aug 2016, 21:00 on BBC One London

Available for years

Historical drama series. Grimaud declares war on the Musketeers, starting with the people they love. Still blinded by grief, will the Musketeers see him coming? Show more
